attributes.action: No to absurd, expensive and unrealistic car insurance prices in UK
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people of United Kingdom are tired of getting expensive and unrealistic quotes to insure our cars. We the people of United Kingdom asks to the UK government to do something, insurance companies in UK are quoting some of us with prices above of £5,000 £10,000, £17,000 per year and the prices goes on.

We the people of United Kingdom, need our cars, even to get a job or to go work, some companies requires us to have a car, and with this insurance prices we simply cannot afford.
